Articles.Content:
Just a quick question: Is there a way to re-size the stock plumes? For example the stock SLS solid. I like how the plume looks, but it's too big for my smaller kicker solids. If it is possible to change the size of the plume, which values in the .cfg would I need to change to get it smaller?

Thanks!

You can only change the emission rates. That is, the speed of the particles (which really determines the length of the plume), and the number of them emitted at any given time.

 

However if you use SmokeScreen as a dependency for your mod, it will allow you to change many more parameters, such as the size of the particles, width of the emission angle, etc.

Can SmokeScreen change the stock plumes? I'm not talking about using the real plume configs, but the standard stock plumes/exhaust flames.

It should has long has your using the stock assets
